name: Haunted Bird
description:
Here , you can hunt and fight haunted birds with amazing power , upgrade your player and defeat all birds in field and don't forget to upgrade your power of magic.

Haunted bird story :
What happened to our village birds !
All birds in ( Darya ) valley was cursed and haunted by evil ,this damn called (cousin of devil ) damn !!
i go to other valley to find any thing help to stop this damn, then find old man that give me a lure witch can bring all haunted bird from the field to one point.
i will try to help my valley , i know its not easy to do this
if i can't then please forget any thing about this story.
, Rakan .

https://www.facebook.com/HauntedBirds
